articles.title: Apple is rolling out VisionOS 1.1. with improved personas - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple released VisionOS 1.1 on Thursday with the most notable feature being improved personas of users.
articles.content: Apple released VisionOS 1.1 on Thursday with the most notable feature being improved personas of users. Specifically, the new update improves hair and makeup appearance, neck and mouth representation… [+1448 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: NASA says bus-sized asteroid will pass Earth by a close margin today; Know how fast it is travelling - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo-group asteroid has been tracked in its orbit and it is expected to pass Earth by a close margin today, March 8, NASA has revealed. Know how big is the asteroid and how close it will get.
articles.content: With the help of its advanced ground and space-based telescopes, NASA has revealed that as many as four asteroids are expected to pass Earth by a close margin today, March 8. Most of these asteroids … [+2054 chars]
